text.autoconfig.netherchest.title: Nether Chest
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.allow: When enabled, hoppers will be able to access
When enabled, hoppers will be able to insert
items into the Nether Chest's inventory
When enabled, hoppers will be able to extract
items from the Nether Chest's inventory
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.enabl: When enabled, Nether Chests can be locked
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.ignor: When enabled, channel keys no longer need to have
identical NBT data to be considered equal
Ignore stack size in multichannel mode
When enabled, channel keys no longer need to have
the same stack size to be considered equal
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.chann: Items whose IDs are listed in this field are banned
from being used as channel keys
Only items whose IDs are listed in this field
can be used as channel keys
